title: Statement by the Press Secretary on the Swearing-In of Prime Minister Matteo Renzi of Italy | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 22, 2014

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on the Swearing-In of Prime Minister Matteo Renzi of Italy




On behalf of the American people, President Obama warmly congratulates Prime Minister Matteo Renzi of Italy and the new Italian government on their swearing-in.  The United States and Italy share an enduring friendship.  The President looks forward to working closely with Prime Minister Renzi and President Napolitano as our two countries jointly seek to promote jobs and economic opportunities on both sides of the Atlantic and tackle today’s complex security challenges.
